https://neurolaunch.com/5-lobes-of-the-brain/

Frontal Lobe: Responsible for executive functions, decision-making, and personality.
Parietal Lobe: Involved in sensory processing and spatial awareness.
Temporal Lobe: Associated with memory, language, and hearing.
Occipital Lobe: Responsible for visual processing.
Cerebellum (Little Brain): Responsible for physical coordination and maintaining balance.
